mapper.select: SELECT * FROM covid_result WHERE DATE(result_date) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY location DESC, result_date

SELECT left(result_date, 7) AS result_date, location, SUM(increment_count) AS increment_count, MAX(total_count) AS total_count FROM covid_result WHERE DATE(result_date) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY location, left(result_date, 7) ORDER BY location DESC, result_date
